Please rank the following dishes from the most healthy to the least, and give me your reasons.

1. Kung Pao Chicken
400 grams of chicken thigh
50 grams of peanuts
2 tablespoons soy sauce
1 tablespoon hoisin sauce
1 tablespoon Shaoxing wine
2 teaspoons cornstarch
3 cloves garlic, minced
2 teaspoons ginger, minced
100 grams bell peppers, diced
3 dried red chilies
1 teaspoon sesame oil

2. Chicken Teriyaki
400 grams of chicken thigh
2 tablespoons soy sauce
2 tablespoons mirin
2 tablespoons sake
1 tablespoon sugar
1 clove garlic, minced
1 teaspoon ginger, grated
2 tablespoon vegetable oil
50 grams spring onions, chopped

3. Grilled Chicken Salad
400 grams of chicken thigh
200 grams of mixed greens (lettuce, spinach, arugula)
100 grams cherry tomatoes, halved
50 grams cucumber, sliced
0.5 avocado, sliced
1 tablespoons olive oil
1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar
1 teaspoon honey
Salt and pepper to taste

4. Chicken Shawarma
400 grams of chicken thigh, thinly sliced
1 tablespoon ground cumin
1 tablespoon paprika
1 teaspoon turmeric
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 tablespoons lemon juice
2 tablespoons yogurt
2 tablespoons olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
100 grams onions, sliced
100 grams tomato, sliced

5. Chicken Adobo
400 grams of chicken thigh
100 grams of potato, cubed
4 cloves garlic, crushed
1/3 cup vinegar
1/4 cup soy sauce
1 cup water
1 teaspoon sugar
1 bay leaf
2 tablespoons cooking oil
Pepper to taste

6. Chicken Provencal
400 grams of chicken thighs
200 grams of tomatoes, diced
100 grams of bell peppers, sliced
60 grams of black olives, pitted
30 grams of garlic, minced
20 ml of olive oil
5 grams of herbs de Provence
Salt and pepper to taste

7. Hähnchenbrust mit Kräutern
400 grams of chicken thighs
150 grams of mushrooms, sliced
100 grams of onions, chopped
90 ml of heavy cream
20 ml of white wine
10 grams of mixed fresh herbs (parsley, thyme, rosemary), chopped
Salt and pepper to taste

8. Greek Lemon Chicken
400 grams of chicken thighs
100 grams of potatoes, sliced
100 grams of carrots, sliced
30 ml of olive oil
30 ml of lemon juice
5 grams of oregano
Salt and pepper to taste

9. Chicken Curry
400 grams of chicken thighs, cut into pieces
200 grams of tomatoes, pureed
100 grams of onions, finely chopped
20 grams of ginger-garlic paste
10 grams of garam masala
5 grams of turmeric
5 grams of cumin
25 ml of vegetable oil
Salt and chili powder to taste

10. Paprikás Csirke (Paprika Chicken)
400 grams of chicken thighs
150 grams of sour cream
130 grams of onions, chopped
20 grams of sweet paprika
5 grams of caraway seeds
Salt and pepper to taste

11. Chicken and Cabbage Stew
400 grams of chicken thighs, cubed
100 grams of cabbage, shredded
100 grams of carrots, sliced
80 grams of potatoes, cubed
1 onion, chopped
2 cloves of garlic, minced
500 ml of chicken broth
30 ml of olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
1 teaspoon of dried thyme

12. Chicken Cacciatore
400 grams of chicken thighs
200 grams of tomatoes, crushed
100 grams of bell peppers, sliced
150 grams of onions, sliced
3 cloves of garlic, minced
80 ml of white wine
30 ml of olive oil
Salt, pepper, and Italian herbs to taste

13. Dak Bulgogi (Korean BBQ Chicken)
400 grams of chicken thigh fillets, sliced
100 grams of onions, sliced
50 ml of soy sauce
20 grams of sugar
30 ml of sesame oil
3 cloves of garlic, minced
10 grams of ginger, minced
1 green onion, chopped
1 tablespoon of sesame seeds

14. Frango Piri Piri
400 grams of chicken thighs
100 ml of piri piri sauce
30 ml of olive oil
3 cloves of garlic, minced
1 lemon, juiced
Salt and pepper to taste

15. Chicken Kasha
300 grams of chicken thighs
80 grams of buckwheat groats
300 ml of chicken stock
80 grams of mushrooms, sliced
1 onion, chopped
25 grams of butter
Salt and pepper to taste

16. Pollo al Ajillo (Garlic Chicken)
400 grams of chicken thighs
30 ml of olive oil
10 cloves of garlic, sliced
50 ml of dry sherry
1 lemon, juiced
Salt and pepper to taste

17. Kyckling i Dill
300 grams of chicken breast
100 grams of potatoes, peeled and diced
100 grams of carrots, peeled and sliced
200 ml of heavy cream
30 grams of fresh dill, finely chopped
1 onion, finely chopped
2 cloves of garlic, minced
15 ml of olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste

18. Thai Basil Chicken (Gai Pad Krapow)
400 grams of chicken thighs
50 grams of Thai basil leaves
4 cloves of garlic, minced
2 bird's eye chilies, finely chopped (adjust to taste)
30 ml of soy sauce
15 ml of fish sauce
15 grams of sugar
30 ml of vegetable oil
1 bell pepper, thinly sliced
1 onion, thinly sliced

19. Gà Xào Sả Ớt
400 grams of chicken thigh
100 grams of lemongrass, finely chopped
4 bird's eye chilies, sliced (adjust to taste)
2 shallots, finely chopped
3 cloves of garlic, minced
25 ml of fish sauce
15 grams of sugar
30 ml of vegetable oil
Fresh coriander for garnish
